home_item1_subtitle: European Food & Beverage Hub | IFS Network
home_item1_additionalText: From R&D design to industrial production: your single partner for functional beverages and food supplements
home_item1_hoverText: European Leadership Position: Featured in the top rankings of professional platforms, GRG Group is among the leading players in beverage and nutrition sourcing in France, Spain, Italy, Germany, Benelux, and beyond.
home_item2_hoverText: We combine scientific expertise and creativity to design unique and reliable products, from formulation to production.
home_item3_hoverText: We support brands and distributors at every key stage, with flexibility and rigor, to bring their ideas to market.
home_item4_hoverText: Our priority: quality, safe, and compliant products that meet consumer expectations and industry standards.
home_item5_hoverText: We work hand in hand with each client to transform your ideas into tangible, market-ready products.
contact_item1_hoverText: Join our network: visit our LinkedIn page to follow our updates.
contact_item2_hoverText: Join us on Facebook to discover our latest news.
contact_item3_hoverText: They trusted us for the development of their products and share their experience with GRG Group.
contact_item4_hoverText: Cross-functional project management from A to Z: we coordinate R&D, production audits, packaging design, and final delivery security for you with a highly effective network of brokers.
contact_item5_hoverText: Ready to turn your concept into an industrial success? Contact our experts for a technical feasibility analysis and tailor-made support.contact@grggroupe.com
products_item1_hoverText: International supplier of BPANI aluminum cans for private-label food and beverage products.
products_item2_hoverText: Our flagship since 2007. Expertise in multi-container development: BPANI cans, glass, PET, and RPET. We offer flexible MOQs (Minimum Order Quantities) to secure the launch of your innovative projects.
products_item3_hoverText: Production engineering for health & wellness capsules and powders. Combination of advanced scientific formulation and premium active ingredient sourcing for your runs starting at 300 kg.
products_item4_hoverText: The future of food supplements: tasty galenics with patented active integration. Development of tailor-made solutions with an entry threshold from 5,000 units.
products_item5_hoverText: The ultimate nomadic and ecological alternative. Access over 36 proprietary recipes available immediately for international deployment under your own brand.
about_item1_hoverText: Since 2007, GRG Group has established itself as a benchmark strategic partner in supporting food and nutraceutical brands across Europe. More than a simple contract manufacturer, we are an integrated solutions hub, combining scientific expertise, production power, and logistical agility.
about_item2_hoverText:
Relying on a strategically located production network in Europe, GRG Group offers robust infrastructure to secure your supply chains:

Beverage Division: 16 lines dedicated to cans (standard, sleek, BPANI), PET, and glass bottles.

Nutraceutical Division: 7 specialized lines for powders and gummies.

Innovation: 3 integrated R&D labs for formulation and active ingredient optimization.
about_item3_hoverText: Access to a catalog of proven formulas (Energy Drinks, Isotonic, Effervescent) for an accelerated Time-to-Market.
about_item4_hoverText: Creative packaging solutions, with the option to delegate this phase partially or entirely according to your needs.
about_item5_hoverText: GRG Group supports you through all project stages, from idea to market launch, with expertise and flexibility.
services_item1_hoverText: Technological mastery of packaging: BPANI canning, PET/RPET or glass bottling. Single-dose sachets, boxing, flatback, doypack, pilbox. High-precision filling adapted to the requirements of liquid, powder, and gummy formats.
services_item2_hoverText: Creation of beverage and supplement recipes according to your objectives: energy, wellness, sport, focus, or sleep. We perform ingredient mapping, samples, technical data sheets, and certificates of analysis.
services_item3_hoverText: Operational excellence guaranteed by the highest international standards: IFS Food, HACCP, DPG, Halal. The certainty of total food safety for your consumers.
services_item4_subtitle:
European Industrial Network: 
23 specialized production lines
services_item4_hoverText: A robust infrastructure of 23 production lines strategically located in Europe to ensure ultra-responsive logistics. Worldwide possibility with lines in the USA and Asia depending on your target market.
services_item5_hoverText: Compliance management (Soda Tax, PLFSS), graphic creation, and visual identity for your brands, from idea to finished product: our technical teams support each development stage, from format selection to production, with a high level of expertise.
